summary.description:
Today, a bit warmer for the feels like temperature (up 2.0°C) and outside temperature (up 1.5°C) and more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 9393 lux) and cloud levels (up 329 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14805 lux), cloud levels (up 1908 m), feels like temperature (up 1.5°C), and outside temperature (up 2.1°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 328.6m lower than yesterday, 832.1m lower than the past week, 1907.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 738.4m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1570.5m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; temperature should feel pleasantly mild. Outside; mild and pleasant. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and very little to no wind will be present. Periods of rain anticipated, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and dim or diffuse light conditions. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
